name: Simple event schedule
author: yaofong

sections.description:
If you are finding a simple basic timetable, this is it.

Features of this plugin:

  • Add,list and delete events in admin panel
  • Output the timetable to any post or page using shortcode ‘[simpleevent]’
  • Edit timetable.css to your match your blog. You can set different style for past, current and future events.
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-event-schedule folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [simpleevent] shortcode in your templates
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Added some css to the timetable
  • Rearranged menu in wp-admin

0.1

  • Initial release

short_description: A basic timetable plugin that allow you to add, delete event and show it on your post or page.
